email_body:
Dear Jane,

We have recently identified a critical security vulnerability in our system that requires your immediate attention. As a cybersecurity expert and valued member of our organization, we kindly request your assistance in addressing this issue promptly.

To ensure the security of our systems and protect sensitive information, we have implemented an urgent security update. In order to safeguard against potential threats, it is essential that you complete the necessary steps outlined in the following link:

Click here

By clicking on the link, you will be redirected to the secure update page where you can follow the provided instructions. Please note that failure to act promptly may result in compromised security and potential data breaches.

If you have any questions or require further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to our cybersecurity team. Your prompt attention to this matter is greatly appreciated.

Best regards,

Emily Roberts

SafeSecurity Team
